title: Web Developer
copy: Worked full-stack wise to deliver different kinds of web applications to clients ranging from small start-ups to large corporations.;Analyzed weakness and incapacity of a current project, applied reasonable and moderate encapsulation, reduced complexity and made the project more modular.;Architected the whole PWA(Progressive Web Application) project,including data table design, REST API convention,and front-end side architecture (React.js).;Developed offline feature as well as auto-update functionality, utilized IndexedDB instead of cache storage, made large file cache became possible across browsers. (Safari only allows 50MB PWA cache storage at that moment - Oct. 2021);Collaborated with design and video teams to deliver cross-browser optimized and fully responsive UI.;Provided optimized algorithm solution for a project, improved 60% in running time in extreme circumstances.;Improved user interaction greatly on one of the projects, experienced 30% growth in users after three months of release.;

title: Graduate Research Assistant
copy: Held a research assistant role in a neuroscience research program using Machine Learning to figure out the relationship between the IQ of one brain and its 3D-scan data.;Implemented several machine learning algorithms including Logical Regression, Random Forest, deep learning, etc.;Applied grid search using Sklearn for Hyperparameter optimization.;Implemented deep learning in TensorFlow and designed a special loss function made the model converge ideally.;
